name: NOTE_EXT_REL_PSTDX
description: This table stores information about external post-procedure diagnoses related to an external note.

columns.name: NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the note contact. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the note record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: EXT_REL_PSTDX_NAME
columns.description: Free text name of a post-procedure diagnosis associated with the external note
